snippet.title: Hot Lap League: Deluxe Edition - Steam Trailer [PEGI 3]
snippet.description:
Get it now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2068710/Hot_Lap_League_Deluxe_Edition/

Play now on Nintendo Switchᵀᴹ, available on the Nintendo eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/hot-lap-league-deluxe-edition-switch/

Play now on Mobile!
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/hot-lap-league/id1526090084
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ultimatestudio.hotlapleague.premium

Take complete control of your vehicle, perfect your driving, and prove your place in the Hot Lap League. Drift and race your car around 150+ mind-blowing tracks, each requiring unique techniques and strategies. Improving your time by racing your best is the only way to the top.
It’s you, the track and the clock - no driving assist, no-nonsense.

You have full control of the car, and the handling feels right - just bring your skill; this is Hot Lap League. 

The Deluxe Edition of the game includes the full breadth of premium car models unlocked and ready to race in their garage, giving players the biggest choice of cars to chase down medals in style.

Hot Lap League Discord: https://discord.gg/N6gAYTf7E8
Hot Lap League Twitter: https://twitter.com/Hot_Lap_League
Hot Lap League Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HotLapLeague
Hot Lap League Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hotlapleague/
Hot Lap League YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/HotLapLeagueGame
Hot Lap League Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/HotLapLeagueGame/
Ultimate Studio Website: https://ultimate.studio/

#ultimatestudio #hotlapleague #ios #android #racinggame #jeudecourse #madewithunity #videogames #nintendoswitch #pc #steam

Released with the assistance of Film Victoria.
